about_the_game:
Classic and simple Spider Solitaire card game, just like the one you'll find built-in to Windows.

  • Three difficulty levels: ♠️, ♠️+♥, ♠️+♥+♣+♦.

  • Customizable themes: Theme color changes with selectable card-back and background images.

  • Magical items: Extra Slot, Force Move, and Swap Card.

  • Global ranking: Compete with players worldwide.

  • Smooth gameplay: Single-click dragging, double-click fast moves, keyboard/gamepad support, and built-in key remapping options.

  • Auto save/load: Quit and return at anytime you want!

  • Unlimited undo & redo: Full undo & redo capabilities even if you quit game in the middle! No penalty if all undo moves are recovered with redo moves!

  • Challenge high score players: Can you beat the high scores with the same card set?

  • Watch replay and beat it: You can replay any game you ever played and try it over & over again. Never give up on a promising game!

  • Endless mode: The game will never finish until you emptied the bottom right pile of cards. Hit your best score with no limits!

  • Boss mode: You can play this game safely in this mode even if your boss comes around frequently!

  • Bonus Score: Flip Streak, Collecting Cards Right After Issuing, Collecting Cards In Row...Every hardcore operation brings you extra bonus score!

  • Music Player: Play or pause, playing in different modes like loop, shuffle, or play in order.

Note: Some game functions are limited in demo version.
